# function: version

Return the provider version string for diagnostics and debugging.

## Example Usage

```terraform
terraform {
  required_providers {
    validatefx = {
      source  = "The-DevOps-Daily/validatefx"
      version = ">= 0.0.1"
    }
  }
}

provider "validatefx" {}

output "validatefx_version" {
  value = provider::validatefx::version()
}
```

## Signature

<!-- signature generated by tfplugindocs -->
```text
version() string
```
